commands.name: az synapse sql pool create
commands.syntax:
az synapse sql pool create --name
                           --performance-level
                           --resource-group
                           --workspace-name
                           [--collation]
                           [--no-wait]
                           [--storage-type {GRS, LRS}]
                           [--tags]
examples:
az synapse sql pool create --name sqlpool --performance-level "DW1000c" \
--workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg --collation "SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CS_AS"

commands.name: az synapse sql pool delete
examples: az synapse sql pool delete --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool list
examples: az synapse sql pool list --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool list-deleted
examples: az synapse sql pool list-deleted --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool pause
examples: az synapse sql pool pause --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool restore
commands.summary: Create a new SQL pool by restoring from a backup.
commands.syntax:
az synapse sql pool restore --dest-name
                            [--deleted-time]
                            [--ids]
                            [--name]
                            [--performance-level]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--storage-type {GRS, LRS}]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--tags]
                            [--time]
                            [--workspace-name]
examples:
az synapse sql pool restore --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg \
--dest-name newsqlpool --time 2020-11-25T02:47:37

commands.name: az synapse sql pool resume
examples: az synapse sql pool resume --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool show
examples: az synapse sql pool show --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg

commands.name: az synapse sql pool show-connection-string
commands.summary: Generate a connection string to a SQL pool.
commands.syntax:
az synapse sql pool show-connection-string --client {ado.net, jdbc, odbc, php, php_pdo}
                                           [--auth-type {ADIntegrated, ADPassword, SqlPassword}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--workspace-name]
examples: az synapse sql pool show-connection-string --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace -c ado.net

commands.name: az synapse sql pool update
examples:
az synapse sql pool update --name sqlpool --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace --resource-group rg \
--tags key1=value1

commands.name: az synapse sql pool wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of a SQL pool is met.
